content: “El Paso” by Marty Robbins appears on his 1959 album,

children: This song won the Grammy Award for Best Country & Western Recording of 1960. It’s a story song, sung in the first person about forbidden love and a jealous boyfriend.  Like
, the story ends poorly for the protagonist.
